### Read in Data
```{r}
options( warn = -1, width = 160 )
census_data <- read.csv("../data/Census Guyana 2012 v2.csv")
head(census_data)
options(digits = 3)

gender <- census_data[,c(4,5)]
ethnicity <- census_data[,c(6:13)]
age <- census_data[,c(14:31)]
religion <- census_data[,c(33:44)]
industry <- census_data[,c(45:65)]
```

### Correlation Matrix
```{r}
remove_for_cor <- c(1,2,3)
cor(census_data[-remove_for_cor])

# We need to remove all variables that have correlations over 0.9 and below 0.15 between most variables.


```
